name: Flying Mouse
description:
The mouse is trying it's hardest to deliver the message of love. He must go through the trials in heaven, with many pillars in his way. How far can he go?

Instructions:

This is a flappy bird-like game. Mechanics below:

  • Press Cheese (Play) button to start (or restart)
  • Press keys or tap to keep mouse flying while avoiding the pillar.
  • Game over once the mouse hit any pillar or the cloud ground.

To make mouse fly / move upwards:

  • PC - use Left Mouse Button or Space key
  • Mobile - Tap (Touch) anywhere on screen

This is my first game (done by following tutorials), my first step/experiment in game dev. Hopefully, this game will be updated with more features or gameplay mechanics as I learn more about game development.

P.S. Let's see how far can the little white mouse of my experiment go, as well as how far can I level up in my journey as a game dev.

Updates / Follow me @ https://twitter.com/CheeseMoonX3 or https://www.youtube.com/c/CheeseMoonX3
